reviewText: The Break is not only motivational, but full of comdey as well.  Its a well rounded film that I'll never get sick of.  I highly recomend this item to anyone out there who likes not only tennis, but to see an underdog come through and his bumpy road to becoming the best.

The caricaturizing of the pro tennis minor leagues in The Break is very funny and educating.  Vince VanPatton does a great job of showing behind the scene situations that one would not know about unless they played on the pro satelite circuit themselves.

I bought this being a fan of Betsy Russell and ended up loving everything about the movie itself.  I had never seen it but watching, and don't get me wrong it really was your typical sports feel good movie but you know what in today's day and age, what is wrong with that.....we need more happy endings!!  Well done....absolutely loved it :)
This is a good movie loved it a lot and it was a good one
How can I not like this Movie I was in it.
you have to be a tennis fan to appreciate this movie
Only bought  this because my daughter is in it...a girl in the bleachers.. LOL

Have seen movie before have it in my video collection in vhs form,,, very good movie
JAN VINCENT VERY GOOD ACTOR
Great movie for the entire family. Originally owned on VHS but wanted it on DVD. Don't miss out on this gem.

this movie was filmed in St. Petersburg, Florida and my son and I were actually Extras in it. found myself in a few scenes in the crowd on the bleachers in the last 10 mins. so gotta give it rave reviews.  Storyline is good too, written by actor Jimmy van Patten.
